actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the President should seek an agreement with the Soviet Union and other nations to eliminate nuclear weapons.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should begin negotiating an agreement with the Soviet Union and with other nations possessing a potential nuclear capability to dispose of all nuclear weapons and to ban the development, possession, deployment, testing, or use of nuclear weapons.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the President should seek an agreement with the Soviet Union and other nations to eliminate nuclear weapons.
